analyteid.description: Athena ID for the given lab result observation/analyte

analytename.description: Name / description specific to this analyte

loinc.description: Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes ID, if available

units.description: Units for this analyte entry, if provided by the lab

analytedate.description: Date when this observation was recorded

description.description: General description of the lab result test

note.description: Additional note for this analyte, if applicable

abnormalflag.description: Status indicator of the measurement relative to normal (low, high, normal, abnormal)

abnormalhl7code.description: The HL7 code related to the abnormal flag.

abnormalhl7name.description: The HL7 description related to the abnormal flag.

valuestatus.description: DEPRECATED -- use "abnormalflag" instead. Status indicator of the measurement relative to normal (low, high, normal, abnormal)

referencerange.description: Reference range of values accepted as normal for this observation

resultstatus.description: The status of the result (e.g., "final", "preliminary", "corrected", etc.)

labresultstatus.description: The status of the underlying lab result

providerid.description: The provider ID for this document.

attachmentexists.description: This flag depicts if the lab result has a scanned document attachment or not.

labresultdatetime.description: The observation date and time associated with this lab result. Returned in mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss format.

priority.description: Document priority, when available. 1 is high, 2 is normal. Some labs use other numbers or characters that are lab-specific.

patientnote.description: The external note for the patient.

internalnote.description: The 'Internal Note' attached to this document.

facilityid.description: The ID of the clinical provider associated with this clinical document. Clinical providers are a master list of providers throughout the country. These include providers as well as radiology centers, labs and pharmacies.

labresultid.description: Athena ID for this lab result

orderid.description: The athena ID of the associated order document

labresultloinc.description: The LOINC for the result document or associated order.

labresultdate.description: Observation date associated with this lab result

labresultnote.description: Additional note associated with this lab result, if any

resultstatus.description: The status of the result (e.g., "final", "preliminary", "corrected", etc.)
